alert.note: Alert for Southern Mountains; Upper Sevier River Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 3:19PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Garfield and east central Iron Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 319 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Panguitch, or 28 miles south of Beaver, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Panguitch. This includes US Route 89 between mile markers 131 and 142. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Southern Mountains; Upper Sevier River Valleys
